resources.string: I practice UX design where I am aimed to deliver experienced Digital UI so as to fully utilize my career as a UX designer. To be able to overview color settings and get information about complex vectors.I also have certification from Coursera in UX/UI Design.
I am an Android developer who is determined to creating android apps that will make things easier.I know how to work with MVVM Retrofit, data storage, dao and other architecture in android studio.

I am a certified data analyst from Coursera where I am able to analyze data and present it. I also do customer service support.Through the certification I use software such as SPSS. I am also good ant python language. After I analyze data I clean it an then present it in presentable diagrams both in 2D and 3D.

I got skills on IT Support with responsibilities such as diagnosing problems and delivering workable solutions via phone email or desk and also ensure that all user issues are resolved with agreed service level and rapport building. Through my certification I am able to work with wide operating systems such as Windows and Linux.
